content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” wpex_bg_overlay=”color” css=”.vc_custom_1553096569747{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/tgpflatlay1.jpg?id=1981) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” wpex_bg_overlay_color=”#383d47″ wpex_bg_overlay_opacity=”0.4″][vc_column]

Colour changes everything
We believe that colour is the soul of design

Need help? Get an In-Home Colour Consultancy with our interior design expert

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_empty_space height=”15px”]Get in touch [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1551377548369{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background: #efebe7 url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/The-Good-Painter-white-smaller.png?id=213) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}” wpex_bg_position=”96% 80%”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1545221611396{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/5″]

Bespoke Colour Consultation.
Curating spaces for remarkable living

Let our interior designers transform your house into a remarkable home.

Choose warm, earth tones for snug living spac-es designed for protection, comfort, and reas-surance. Surround yourself with shelter of browns and greys, burnt oranges and ochres. Choose vibrant adventurous greens for an uplifting space. Colour is a palette of energy, and we know how to use it.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1548506821695{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column]

Transform your home with colour

Why you need a colour consultation from the Experts in Colour?

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1548506840940{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Find the perfect colour

[vc_column_text]

Help unlock your personal style and develop a balanced and harmonious colour palette for a happier home.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Get the right paint and finish

[vc_column_text]

Choose the right paint and finish for each space in your home: for beauty, durability, and exceptional taste.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Maximise potential

[vc_column_text]

Maximise the potential of the space with the right colour. Did you know, the correct colour shade you can make small space seem much grander?

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Get a little extra

[vc_column_text]

Get help choosing the perfect shade, even when working with a problematic space.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1555441436784{margin-top: 20px !important;padding-top: 32px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;background-color: #5ed1c7 !important;}”][vc_column]

You are already living in your dream home

Get in touch

We will help you see how

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1548506821695{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column]

Bespoke Colour consultation with Expert

Colour Consultation Process Explained

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1565868552440{padding-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/5″]

Pre-appointment

[vc_column_text]Simply, we speak to you. We ask the right questions and get prepared.

After booking your exclusive consultation with our colour experts, we will confirm your appointment via email. We love to prepare ahead with ideas based on your preferences, so we send you a pre-assessment questionnaire. You may answer the questions over the phone or respond by email. It helps us establish your needs ahead of the consultation so that we can bring ideas to the table based on the things that you love.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/5″][vc_single_image image=”2009″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1565868561217{padding-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/5″][vc_single_image image=”1988″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/5″]

On the day

[vc_column_text]We spend time with you so that we fully understand you. 

We assess the space, the light, the current decor, and the architecture of your home. We create a personalised colour palette to transform your home into its most beautiful iteration. We suggest colours and finishes designed to maximise the potential of the space. We will consider up to four rooms, and take you through schemes that you will love. The final decision is always yours.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1565868569588{padding-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/5″]

Specification

[vc_column_text]We wrap it up into detailed specification, all you need to get started for your painting. 

After your consultation, we’ll turn your wish list into a tangible plan. Within 24 hours. You’ll receive a detailed specification of everything we’ll need to make your transformation project a success. Your detailed itinerary will include the recommended colours and finishes, as ascertained during your consultation. We project the quantity and costs of paint and/or wallpaper required to make your interior dreams come true. Fall in love with your home all over again.  [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/5″][vc_single_image image=”1931″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1565868578678{padding-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/5″][vc_single_image image=”2010″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/5″]

Free paint samples

[vc_column_text]Get it 100% right by having a paint sample. 

 Colours look different on the walls than they do on the swatch. We want you to be 100% satisfied that the colours you’ve chosen are the right ones. That’s why we send you five paint sample kits so that you can try out each one in situ – taking the light and the space into account. We’ll help you choose the perfect shade for you and your home. We want nothing other than for you to be 100% satisfied. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1553100392543{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #5ed1c7 !important;}”][vc_column]

What our customers think

Great team and excellent job! The Good Painter was recommended by a friend of mine, also a professional landlord. The team didn’t disappoint, great service and excellent quality job! I will use the Good Painter the next time I need painting and decorating in London!

AlexSee Case Study
Rating: 5

My wife and I are more than pleased with the final result, and can’t wait to invite friends and family over to our new looking home. We are quite certain to have dealings with your firm in future projects. I would 100% recommend you to my friends, family and colleagues.

JonathanSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you The Good painter! We are extremely happy with the results! We couldn’t ask for a friendlier, more hardworking and dedicated team of professionals! Would happily recommend The Good Painter to friends and family!

 

YasminaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you! We love our new flat, it looks absolutely stunning! We are so happy to have chosen The Good Painter, a fantastic team of hard working guys! Very professional, flexible and friendly service throughout. The good Painter are indeed good painters, excellent painters!

PavelSee case study
Rating: 5

Punctual, friendly and very professional! I have used the services of The Good Painter before and would gladly use them again! The job was completed on time and at a very high quality, the price was excellent, the customer service-very competent and friendly. A pleasure to work with!

AnaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you, The Good Painter! We really appreciate you finishing the job despite the tight time frame and budget!  A team of professionals, decoration at the highest level! We couldn’t be happier with the results.

MonicaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

I recently became a house owner for the first time and needed quality painting and decorating services at a good price. The Good Painter provided both, plus excellent decoration and colour consultancy advice on the top. Stress-free service, very helpful and friendly customer service! I definitely recommend! Thank you!

ZoeSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Easy to work with, friendly, professional and really efficient. What more could you ask for! My flat has never looked better! The decorators did an excellent job!

Bill
Rating: 5
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1565868645864{padding-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column]

Projects

Before and After: A chic and stylish painting and decorating makeover for a busy London businesswoman

When Ana first came to us, she had just become the owner of a two-bedroom…

Success story: Painting and decorating a four-storey family house in Chelsea, London

Yasmina and Labib moved into a five-bedroom house in Chelsea, London a number of years…

Before and After: First Home, First Painting and Decorating Experience for Young Couple

Buying a first property is always exciting but can be challenging - especially for a…

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1552940106725{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #5ed1c7 !important;}”][vc_column]

Yes, I’m ready!

Get in touch to book Your Colour Consulta-tion
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1553004277263{padding-top: 20px !important;background-color: #efebe7 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

We use superior products

We guarantee a perfect result.

[vc_row_inner content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1545307900212{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1065″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1081″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1067″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1018″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1083″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1565868705341{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column]
Latest from our blog

Find Unique Colour Schemes to Celebrate Your Christmas!

If you are anything like us, you love to decorate, prepare and truly feel the festivities of Christmas! And, what better way to feel truly festive than preparing a unique and gorgeous colour scheme that is not the traditional red and green.

Renovate your staircase with these 5 simple tips and ideas with painting and decorating

Are you looking to make the most of your staircase? Do you want to ascend new heights with glorious sets of stairs, creating an excellent fluidity from level to level? Our London painting and decorating company...

Master the art of every colour scheme through painting and decorating

Do you want to become the master of creating intriguing colour schemes and know instinctively what colours complement each other? Our London painting and decorating company...
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1553004243680{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;background-color: #efebe7 !important;}”][vc_column]
